content.raw:
Updated to work for compound bases.  Note: for compound bases, it's best to set all variables to be preconditioned, since matching across the compound interface is effectively a Dirichlet BC for every field.  This can be done simply with:

problem.meta[:]['z']['dirichlet'] = True
